00141         {
00142             // this is semantically valid wrt Attribute::copy().
00143             base::AttributeBase* ta = new Attribute<RetT>("ret", new ReferenceDataSource<RetT>(r));
00144             this->ret( ta );
00145             delete ta;
00146             return *this;
00147         }
